modName: Taken Veterans - Gnarla the Havoc Barbarian
summary:
The Havoc Barabarian is a Two-Handed Berserker Master of Illusion. 
\"Veterans\" are pre-built, skilled and equipped in tune with the limitations of their experience. The entire game is unexplored yet adapted to your new level.
descriptionHtml:
\"Veterans\" are pre-built characters, skilled and equipped in tune with the limitations of their experience. The entire game is unexplored, and adapted to your new level allowing you to try out advanced play-styles and quest-lines without the hours of involved preliminaries.

Gnarla - Female Orc Havoc Barbarian
or Gnarls - Male Orc Havoc Barbarian

Gnarla is a level 30 Two-Handed berserking master of Illusion. In combat she wields her battleaxe with devastating prowess, cutting through enemies in fell swoops. When facing multiple opponents she sends them into a Frenzy to draw attention away while her skilled Blocking and Heavy Armor provide admirable protection even through extended battles. When things get too hairy, she\'ll cast Muffle and Invisibility to Sneak out for a rethink, or buy a few more seconds of swing time with a healing Restoration spell.

Gnarla\'s pampered upbringing resulted in her Lawful Evil alignment, and only a grudging respect of authority or for law & order. She understands you must keep the rabble in line, but rules only apply to those who don\'t know better, and she knows better. When she sees equipment or resources she could put to better use than the current owner, she takes them, because she deserves them. Disrespect or stepping out of line by others than herself, however, is not to be tolerated. Those types will be taught a lesson their survivors will not forget.

Level 30 Orc with
29 Unallocated Perk Points
210 Magicka (+50 Highborn Power)
170 Health
210 Stamina

Gnarla\'s Initial Skill Set:
	Illusion 100
	Heavy Armor, Two-Handed 75
	Restoration, Speech, Block 50
	Enchanting, Archery, Smithing, Conjuration, Light Armor, One-Handed, Sneak, Pickpocket, Alchemy, Lockpicking, Alteration, Destruction 15

1*(99*100/2) + 2*(74*75/2) + 3*(49*50/2) + 12*(14*15/2)
= 15,435 Experience

Gnarla Starts Knowing These Spells:
	Muffle, Frenzy, Rally, Invisibility, Pacify, Rout, Hysteria, Call to Arms, Harmony, Mayhem
	Bound Sword, Bound Battleaxe, Bound Bow
	Close Wounds, Greater Ward, Heal Other, Repel Lesser Undead, Turn Undead

Gnarla Has Learned These Shouts:
	Disarm	(Zun Haal Viik)
	Slow Time (Tiid Klo Ul)
	
Gnarla\'s Heritage Provides These Additional Powers:
	Imperial Luck (Find more gold)
	Highborn (+50 Magicka & Regen Daily)
	
Gnarla\'s Starting Gear:
	Ring of Recovery 00100e5c
	Necklace of Renewal 0010df5e
	Orcish Helmet of Major Restoration	000cf814
	Orcish Armor of Major Illusion	0010dedd
	Orcish Gauntlets of Eminent Sure Grip	000cf7fa
	Orcish Boots of Brawn	000cf7b0
	
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
2.0 Added equipment, powers, & shouts, and refined the stats.
1.2 Overhauled stats. Added Gnarls the Male Havoc Barbarian
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Whenever a character earns a rank in a skill they gain that much experience. So when a character has 0 in all skills they have zero experience, and when they have 100 in all skills, at around level 81, they have 89,100 experience. A level 30 character should have 15,560 total experience summed from their skills.

Taken Veterans should look good with any texture or mesh mods you may use, if any. The mods used in the screenshots include:
Face Textures (Female): [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563]Coverwomen[/url]
Face Textures (Male): [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=26]Detailed Faces[/url]

Look in the discussions area for the batch commands allowing you to make a veteran out of any Level 1 character!

More Info:
[url=http://bit.ly/SkyrimExp]Experience Table[/url]
[url=http://bit.ly/SkyrimCharBatch]Tips on making your own veterans[/url]

Drop a Taken Veteran save game in your Saves folder and load it up. See what you think!
author: Taken
